q1: My family is from France. I am obligated to like them. Do you think they will embarrass us again this year?
a1: They have been struggling for a while but after each downfall comes an uprising, they will redeem themselves.
q2: Letf hope France can pull it off
a2: They did, in the world cup
q3: They have done brilliantly this year
a3: They did, but they should watch out for those northern European teams in the next few years.
q4: They just won the World Cup!!
a4: Will they also win the Euro Cup?
q5: yes because they are not good
a5: Yes, I totally agree, I am a great team and I can win the Euro Cup
